GSD.description:
PM / devfreq: rk3399_dmc: Disable edev on remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 664736e2cc09e504ce58ec61164d029d1f2651bb. For more details please see the references link.
